item.title: Programming Tutorial
item.description: I organized a programming tutorial for scientists with two other members of WINGS-ABC. Tutorial Webpage The goal of this tutorial was to introduce a variety of know-how which is very common in expert programmers but not known among scientists. We covered the following topics: Sharing the code Environment setup (pip, pyenv, pipenv, Docker, VSCode) Parameter search and logging (mlflow) Version control Readability of the code Linter, Type checker Test, Unit test Reproducibility of Jupyter notebook We also prepared sample codes for a deeper understanding of our tutorial.
